row.process:
! RDS hosts :SET &RDSHOST01 = "epsprpe0001d" :SET &RDSHOST02 = "epsprpe0002d"
! CAMLFT hosts :SET &CAMLFTHOST01 = "epsprpe0001d" :SET &CAMLFTHOST02 = "epsprpe0002d"
:SET &APPIAN_HOST = 'BPMPRAP0001D' :SET &APPIAN_LOGIN = 'PROD.LOGIN.U.TBS.X.BPMPROD' :SET &FIN_HOST = 'SMD1PRCLIIS0001' :SET &FIN_LOGIN = 'PROD.LOGIN.W.CLEARING_HOUSE.X.PBUC4USR'
:SET &GB2ADM = 'PROD.LOGIN.U.X.X.GFPROD' :SET &MARS = 'TOCCADMLS0001D' :SET &APPIAN_PCR_PATH# = "/cme/bpmprod/ftp/pcr_outbound" :SET &PCR_SCRIPT_PATH# = "/cme/gfix/jmx/prod/scripts" :SET &MSG_HOST# = 'DCPRAPP0001D' :SET &MSG_LOGIN# = 'PROD.LOGIN.U.X.X.GFPROD'
:SET &CLOUD_APPIAN_HOST# = 'CLPRXFR0001D' :SET &CLOUD_APPIAN_LOGIN# = 'PROD.LOGIN.U.UC4.X.UC4'
:SET &UC4_APP_HOST# = 'UCPRAP0001D' :SET &UC4_APP_LOGIN# = 'PROD.LOGIN.U.UC4.X.UC4' :SET &MSGW_TOGGLE_PATH# = "/cme/uc4/shared/users/toggleMSGW"
:SET &WORKDAY_BATCH_HOST# = 'WDPRMW0001D' :SET &WORKDAY_BATCH_LOGIN# = 'PROD.LOGIN.U.X.X.DABR'
:SET &SFTP_HOST# = 'UC4-PROD-FT' :SET &SFTP_LOGIN# = 'PROD.LOGIN.U.UC4.X.UC4'
:SET &SLP_PATH_1# = '/cme/appianftp/appian_internal/Workday/OB EOD Files' :SET &SLP_PATH_2# = '/cme/dabr/erpm/ftp/sailpoint' :SET &SLP_PATH_3# = '/export/prod_sftpng/users/BUQWD001FTP/cme/ftp/QWD001/Incoming/Appian'
:SET &ERPM_PATH1# = '/cme/dabr/erpm/ftp' :SET &ERPM_WIN_HOST# = 'SMD1OATBERP0001' :SET &ERPM_WIN_UC4LOGIN# = 'PROD.LOGIN.W.UC4.X.UC4ADMIN' :SET &RC_BATCH_HOST# = 'BPMPRAP0201D' :SET &RC_BATCH_LOGIN# = 'PROD.LOGIN.U.X.X.DABR'
:SET &CASHSTARTCMD = '/usr/local/bin/cash start -f' :SET &DCMSG_HOST# = 'DCPRAPP0001D' :SET &DCMSG_LOGIN# = 'PROD.LOGIN.U.X.X.GFPROD'
:SET &FAS_HOST1# = 'faprfas0101d'
! UC4 Host :SET &UC4PROD = 'UCPRAP0001D'
! EDH Reuters Hosts :SET &EDH_REUTERS_HOST1 = 'edhprap0001d' :SET &EDH_REUTERS_HOST2 = 'edhprap0002d' :SET &EDH_REUTERS_HOST3 = 'edhprap0003d'
! Datamine On Prem Server :SET &EDH_ONPREM_HOST4# ='dmprhe0004d'
! Product Server :SET &IRHOST3 = 'CLPRIR0003D'
! Env specific Argument for TogglePlus :SET &TP_ENV_YGW# = 'YGWTogglePlus_PROD'
